name: Light Switch Simulator 2023 VR
description:
Prepare to experience the present of light-switch-simulation-based VR gaming with Light Switch Simulator 2023 VR!

Feel the rush of turning a light switch on, then off again if you're feeling daring. Continue toggling the light switch to your heart's content until 2024, when the experience will immediately become a relic of the past due to the rapid and continuing advances in VR light switch simulation technology.

Note: Light Switch Simulator 2023 VR requires an OpenXR compatible VR headset* and at least one hand controller** to get the full experience.

* Light Switch Simulator 2023 VR may not work on all OpenXR compatible VR headsets, but it for sure doesn't work without any.

** Light Switch Simulator 2023 VR may, in some cases, work without any hand controllers with reduced functionality. Additionally, Light Switch Simulator 2023 VR may not work even with one or more hand controllers.
